response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it could significantly contribute to your company's growth and success. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I look forward to discussing how this product can be seamlessly integrated into your operations and the positive impact it will have on your business. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
